sentences.en: A superb and inexpensive restaurant. Fine food expertly served by waitresses in appetizing forms.
sentences.cn: 华美而价廉的餐厅. 佳肴迎宾,服务专业,女服务生,开胃方式.

sentences.en: An appetizing smell comes from the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 从厨房里传来令人垂涎的味道.

sentences.en: Even the most finicky eater will find something appetizing here.
sentences.cn: 即使是最挑剔的食客在这里也会找到让人胃口大开的美食。

sentences.en: Kippers are dyed yellow to make them more appetizing.
sentences.cn: 烟熏鲱鱼被腌成了黄色，令人垂涎欲滴。

sentences.en: Limp fries and stale hamburger buns are far from appetizing.
sentences.cn: 这些松软的薯条和不新鲜的汉堡包让你没了味口.

sentences.en: Little boy: Wow, Mr dog! Your food smells so appetizing!
sentences.cn: 小男孩: 哇, 狗先生, 你的食物闻着真馋人.

sentences.en: On my bedside table awaited, with the compliments of the management, an appetizing breakfast.
sentences.cn: 一份让人垂涎的早餐摆在我的床头桌上，那是管理人员的一点小意思。

sentences.en: The dish is attractive to eye and appetizing to the taste.

sentences.cn: 那些食物让人不是特别有胃口。

sentences.en: The list of ingredients sounds very appetizing.
sentences.cn: 这张单子上列的配料听起来使人馋涎欲滴.

sentences.en: The roast beef is very appetizing.
The sounds and smells that came from the open kitchen door were appetizing.
sentences.cn: 从敞着门的厨房飘进来的声音和气味让人发馋.

sentences.en: When she was away for a day or two the house seemed glum - the meals less appetizing.
sentences.cn: 当她有一两天不在家,家里就好象郁郁不乐似的 —— 饭菜就失去了滋味.

words.tran_cn: 促进食欲的；美味可口的；开胃的，诱人的
食欲的；有食欲的；开胃的
吊胃口的东西；开胃食品（等于appetizer）

trans.tran_cn: 促进食欲的， 开胃的，鲜美的，诱人的
trans.tran_en: food that is appetizing smells or looks very good, making you want to eat it
